metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1208 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer underflow in the mov_read_default function in libavformat/mov.c in FFmpeg before 2.4.6 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from heap and/or stack memory via a crafted MP4 file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> As of 2018-09-27, no equivalent fix in libav.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
